wikipedia_page.main: Gerald Humphreys (born 14 January 1946) is a Welsh, retired professional footballer who played as a winger. He made a total of 216 Football League appearances for Everton, Crystal Palace and Crewe Alexandra scoring 32 times.

response: Gerry Humphreys OBE (11 May 1931 – 5 December 2006) was a Welsh sound engineer. He was nominated for two Academy Awards in the category Best Sound. He worked on 250 films between 1952 and 2002. He was appointed OBE in the 1995 New Year Honours.
